name: I Like Bike Tee
description: Printed on a high quality 50/50 tee, this hand-numbered limited edition print is a must for the cyclist, motorcyclist or political activist in your life. I Like Bike takes a new twist on the classic campaign button "I Like Ike" from the 1952 election campaign of Dwight D. Eisenhower for President of the United States. Show your love of bike by sporting this stylish tee shirt.

name: B12 Spray
description:
•	Increases energy levels
•	Reduces stress
•	Enhances growth and repair of all cells
•	Aids in metabolism of carbohydrates and fats
•	Improves protein synthesis
•	Increases mental alertness
•	Makes "You. Better."

Can you get an energy boost without relying on the standard crutches of sugar, caffeine, or other artificial stimulants? You bet your sweet B-12 Spray! Vitamin B-12 is one of the most important daily nutrients, yet most people don't get enough. Some try to get B-12 in a form that's hard for the human body to use, like the inexpensive and common Cyanocobalamin (found in those Couple-Hour Energy shots along with other unnecessary ingredients and sugars), which has to pass through the liver before being converted to Methylcobalamin and then rerouted through the body for absorption. Motivite's B-12 Spray is in Methylcobalamin form and readily available for immediate cellular absorption. A spray a day will keep you moving thanks to our easy-to-absorb, no-filler, no-sugar-added B-12 Spray. And that's why we say, "You. Better."

Note: These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

name: Multi-Vitamin
description:
•	Improves bodily function
•	Boosts immune system
•	Enhances energy
•	Helps lower cholesterol
•	Antioxidant protection
•	Makes "You. Better."

Clear out that medicine cabinet overflowing with vitamins that have failed you! Motivite's Daily Multi-Vitamin gives your body exactly what it craves: Vitamins and minerals that give your body the ability to balance, cleanse, nourish, oxygenate, protect, purify and strengthen itself. It is formulated to ensure maximum absorption and effectiveness of each essential ingredient, and this carefully crafted Motivite formula is based on scientific research and evidence to ensure it is the most comprehensive and balanced nutrient mix you'll find. Daily Multi-Vitamin is made to protect your body's vital systems including cardiovascular, immune, nervous, musculoskeletal, digestive, brain function, and more. Like everything in Motivite’s line of supplements, the Daily Mutli-Vitamin is manufactured to the strictest of standards and contains only the best ingredients (with no filler, junk, or sweeteners that your body doesn't need). It's our commitment to make the best product possible for the best results possible. Your body will respond to Motivite's Daily Multi-Vitamin with improved function and performance, and that's why we say, "You. Better."

Note: These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

name: Joint Lubricant
description:
•	Specially developed Chondroitin and Glucosamine formula
•	Helps support weakened joints
•	Improves range of motion
•	No unnecessary fillers or ingredients
•	Makes "You. Better."

The most common form of arthritis is osteoarthritis, which causes joint inflammation and limits range of motion, especially in the knees, neck, back, hips and fingers. Good thing you don't need any of those joints…oh, wait, you do. Motivite's Joint Lubricant has been specifically developed using Glucosamine and Chondroitin to combat the breakdown of cartilage and promote repair of damaged and painful joints. Just as important as what's in Joint Lubricant (only the finest ingredients!) is what isn't. We don't use fillers and other useless junk to extend our ingredient list; if it doesn't help to improve your joints and cartilage, we don't use it. Motivite's Joint Lubricant banishes the aches and creaks and "oofs!" and that's why we say, "You. Better."

Note: These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

name: Electrolyte
description:
•	Improves stamina
•	Prevents activity-induced dehydration and fatigue
•	Perfect drink choice before or after exercising
•	Great-tasting formula
•	No artificial sweeteners or preservatives
•	Safe and effective for kids
•	Pure awesomeness in a container
•	Very easy on your stomach, easy to digest
•	"You. Better."

You can't swing a bat (or a club) without hitting a "sports drink" these days. While most yell loud and clear that they replenish electrolytes lost during physical activity, they aren't as loud or proud of all the unnecessary ingredients added to make those drinks palatable. Motivite's Electrolyte does what the others can't: Tastes great. Replaces electrolytes. Doesn't use artificial sweeteners, preservatives, or fillers. Facilitates awe-inspiring stamina.

When you exercise, you lose electrolytes through sweat that need to be replenished to keep levels in your body constant. Motivite's Electrolyte drink mix is delicious, effervescent, and has a balance of simple and complex carbohydrates as well as an exclusive electrolyte complex that makes it an ideal drink before and after physical activity. Motivite's Electrolyte drink mix will keep your body from fatiguing, dehydration, and any sort of loss of awesomeness due to physical exertion; that's why we say, "You. Better."

Note: These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

name: Electrolyte Plus
description:
•	Increases Strength
•	Increases Endurance
•	Decreases Recovery Time
•	Decreases Muscle Catabolism
•	Effervescent, delicious formula
•	Gives a boost of energy
•	Makes "You. Better."


We could use a bunch of big words and scientific terms to explain what exactly Motivite's Electrolye Plus drink mix is all about, or we could save everyone's time (and those brain cells that would have to stumble over long, unreadable science terms) and explain it simply: Electrolyte Plus replaces electrolytes that are lost during physical activity and gives your body a boost of energy at the same time.

Electrolyte Plus will increase the supply of oxygen and blood throughout your body, giving your muscles more nutrients when they need it most: before, during, and after exercise. This specially formulated, great-tasting drink mix keeps your muscles from attacking themselves, increases endurance and strength, and will decrease the time it takes your body to recover from exertion. Got a problem with that? No, we didn't think so. Motivite's Electrolyte Plus drink mix gives you a balanced ratio of simple and complex carbohydrates for sustained energy levels. It supplies energy-producing B vitamins and water-soluble minerals that make it a well-rounded electrolyte, energy and recovery supplement. As an added benefit, Caffeine USP and Evodiamine are added for increased thermogenesis (big word for a body's ability to produce heat), focus and enhanced energy levels. That's why we say, "You. Better."

Note: These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

name: Recovery Plus
description:
•	Promotes Muscular and Cellular Recovery
•	Gives you L-glutamine amino acid to replace what's lost during exercise
•	Great-tasting drink
•	Boosts energy
•	Makes "You. Better."

L-glutamine is a protein amino acid found in all life forms, and it's the amino acid your body calls on when it's subjected to stress or trauma. If you're not replacing L-glutamine when you exercise, then you're not operating at your body's highest potential and your muscles could start to break down. To keep your amino acids in balance and give your body a much-needed boost of energy after physical exertion, Motivite's Recovery Plus has been specially formulated to provide you everything needed to be at your peak of performance. Motivite was founded on the belief that if you put the best stuff in your body, you'll get the best results out of your body; that's why our Recovery Plus drink mix has no artificial sweeteners, preservatives, or unnecessary junk like other after-exercise drinks. Bounce back after exercising and feel energized with Motivite's Recovery Plus – another reason we say, "You. Better."

Note: These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

name: Whey Protein
description:
•	Low-fat, low-carbohydrate protein
•	Superior source of whey protein and casein
•	Effective for muscle growth and repair
•	Promotes healthy joint function
•	Accelerates recovery time
•	Three grams of fiber per serving
•	Mixes easily without a blender
•	Natural Chocolate or Vanilla flavors
•	Safe for everyone who needs more protein, including kids
•	Makes "You. Better."

Let's cut to the chase: The number of whey proteins available on the market is in the triple digits, but Motivite's Whey Protein is simply the best. Our low-fat and low-carbohydrate formula helps you build muscle without unnecessary physical gains, and there are none of those dreaded artificial or synthetic ingredients. This product is a superior source of whey protein and milk protein isolates (casein), giving you multi-functional time-released proteins that provide an optimal ratio of essential and non-essential amino acids that reduce recovery time. Motivite Whey Protein is better than whey protein alone, because whey rapidly increases protein synthesis and casein blocks protein breakdown, giving you sustained amino acid availability. After consuming whey protein alone, levels of blood amino acids peak for approximately one hour, then drop dramatically. After consuming casein, blood amino acids peak from one to two hours and remain elevated for up to seven hours without loss. You'll benefit from both effects with Motivite Whey Protein, plus this formula's source of Biological Milk Compounds called Microlactin have been clinically proven to promote healthy joint function and accelerate recover time (it may also decrease joint pain and stiffness wand improve mobility and range of motion.) 

Motivite Whey Protein is super-duper soluble, which means it easily mixes without the need of a blender. We use only natural flavors and all-natural SweetLeaf™ Stevia to make both your taste buds and your body happy with a great-tasting, naturally delicious formula. Motivite Whey Protein also offers three grams of fiber per serving to support a healthy digestive system and help keep cholesterol levels in check.

Motivite Whey Protein is a great source of protein for low-carbohydrate dieters, athletes, children or anyone who needs to add additional protein to their diet. Since it can be mixed with a spoon or shaker cup, the benefits of Motivite Whey Protein can be enjoyed almost anywhere. Motivite Whey Protein can also be added to foods such as fruit smoothies, pancakes, muffins, oatmeal, cereal, yogurt or pudding. Motivite Whey Protein is better than the rest and ready to help you be your best, and that's why we say, "You. Better."

Note: These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

name: Meal Replacement
description:
•	Complete Nutrition
•	Increase Lean Body Mass
•	Increases Energy, Strength and Endurance
•	Decreases Recovery Time and Muscle Catabolism
•	May Assist in Weight Loss
•	28% of daily fiber in 1 serving
•	Quick and Convenient
•	Mixes Instantly
•	Helps Regulate Insulin Levels.
•	No Artificial Sweeteners, Flavors and it’s GLUTEN FREE.
•	Makes “You. Better.”

Do you ever get hungry? Sure, we all do. Seriously, though, Motivite’s Meal Replacement is a great way to stave off hunger between meals or physical activities (when you just don’t want the weight of a full meal in your stomach). Additionally, Motivite’s Meal Replacement can aid in weight loss by preventing those between meal snack attacks that can wreak havoc on your waistline, and ruin an otherwise healthy day of eating. By substituting Motivite’s Meal Replacement between three healthy, balanced meals, your body will get the protein and nutrients it needs for optimum performance and health.

Note: These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
